longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for a minimum of 6 months from the arrival date. 

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 60 days for holders
of an APEC Business Travel Card (ABTC) endorsed
"Valid for travel to PNG". 
Visa Issuance:
Visa required, except for Holders of a return/onward ticket
can obtain a visa on arrival for a max. stay of 60 days at
Port Moresby (POM) and Rabaul (RAB). Fee: Varies from free of
charge to PGK 500.-. 
 - for holders of Hong Kong (SAR China) or Macao (SAR China)
   passports; 
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay. 
Warning:
- Passport number and nationality must match those stated on
  the APEC Business Travel Card (ABTC)
vaccination:
Passengers arriving within 6 days after leaving or transiting
countries with risk of yellow fever transmission For details, click here
and not holding a yellow fever vaccination certificate are
subject to quarantine for 6 days. 

Recommended:
- Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, mainly due to P.
  falciparum, exists throughout the year in the whole country
  below 1800m.  Recommended prevention: C.
